attributes.action: allow voters the option of "None of the Above" in national,  EU and local council elections
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Suffrage is a hard won freedom we all thankfully enjoy, however for true democracy to exist, the choice of the voter should accurately represent the political opinions of that voter. If this is not possible because there are no parties acceptable to the voter then a means of expressing dissatisfaction with the available parties is essential to stimulate modern politicians to do better to represent the opinions of the public. This will also allow differentiation of the apathetic voter from the active (non-apathetic) abstainer.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament or the Electoral Commission at http://www.electoralcommission.org.uk/
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
